name: Slap-It Together
storyline: You have been forcefully selected to participate in the latest, greatest and most SLAPTASTICAL gameshow the world has seen! As a contestant, it's your job to entertain us! Fight off my increasingly growing horde of zombielike creations with your bare hands. Let's keep it kid-friendly, though! NO GUNS. Amuse my viewers and let's watch my fame increase, together.
summary: Set in a game show that only cares for the numbers; you and up to 3 online friends slap, throw and whack your way through hordes of enemies and hand-painted environments in this comedic zombie wave-based fighter.
